Task1: Summarize recent advancements in quantum computing from the past five years.
msg1: Gather necessary information from the research database. Since the tool research_database is useful for gathering information, we use it in this step.
msg2: Summarize these advancements to capture the evolution and key breakthroughs in quantum computing.
Task2: Identify influential papers on renewable energy technologies.
msg3: Search through the research database for pivotal papers published on renewable energy technologies.
msg4: Identify and list the most influential papers, highlighting groundbreaking studies and influential authors.

Task1: Inspect and repair potential security vulnerabilities in the company's internal network.
msg1: Use the SysMonitor tool to scan for potential security vulnerabilities in the company's internal network.
msg2: Postprocess the gathered data to fix identified vulnerabilities and apply necessary updates.
Task2: Monitor server performance and optimize resource allocation.
msg3: Use the SysMonitor tool to monitor performance metrics across all active servers.
msg4: Postprocess the performance data to optimize resource allocation across the servers.

Task1: Analyze recent market trends and provide investment recommendations for the next quarter.
msg1: Use the MarketDataAPI tool to gather recent market data and trends.
msg2: Postprocess the gathered data to provide investment recommendations.
Task2: Evaluate the performance of the current investment portfolio and recommend adjustments.
msg3: Use the MarketDataAPI tool to gather the latest performance data on current investments.
msg4: Postprocess the investment data to recommend necessary adjustments to the portfolio.

Task1: Review the new contract draft and ensure its compliance with relevant regulations.
msg1: Use the LegalDocReview tool to review the legal terms of the new contract draft.
msg2: Postprocess the reviewed document to ensure compliance with relevant regulations.
Task2: Draft a new non-disclosure agreement (NDA) and ensure its compliance with international regulations.
msg3: Use the LegalDocReview tool to draft a new non-disclosure agreement (NDA) with appropriate legal terms.
msg4: Postprocess the drafted NDA to ensure it complies with international regulations.

Task1: Based on the symptoms provided by the patient, give a possible diagnosis and suggest an appropriate treatment plan.
msg1: Use the MedicalDatabase tool to search for information on diseases and symptoms.
msg2: Postprocess the gathered information to provide a diagnosis and suggest a treatment plan.
Task2: Review patient history and adjust ongoing treatment plans as needed.
msg3: Use the MedicalDatabase tool to review the patient's medical history and current treatment plan.
msg4: Postprocess the medical history to update the patient's treatment plan as necessary.

Task1: Help the student choose suitable university courses and evaluate their current academic performance.
msg1: Use the CourseSelector tool to recommend suitable courses and schools for the student.
msg2: Postprocess the course selection to evaluate the student's academic performance.
Task2: Assist a student in preparing for college applications by selecting the most suitable courses.
msg3: Use the CourseSelector tool to identify courses that will strengthen the student's college application.
msg4: Postprocess the selected courses to evaluate the student's academic readiness for college applications.

Task1: Help the patient manage anxiety and develop a personalized treatment plan.
msg1: Use the TherapyGuide tool to provide psychological therapy suggestions for anxiety management.
msg2: Postprocess the therapy plan to track the patient's mental health progress.
Task2: Assist a patient with managing stress through cognitive-behavioral techniques.
msg3: Use the TherapyGuide tool to recommend cognitive-behavioral techniques for managing stress.
msg4: Postprocess the therapy recommendations to monitor the patient's progress using the techniques.

Task1: Optimize the product catalog on the ecommerce platform and analyze recent sales data.
msg1: Use the InventoryManager tool to optimize the product catalog and manage inventory.
msg2: Postprocess the optimized catalog to analyze recent sales data.
Task2: Increase customer retention by improving the user experience on the e-commerce platform.
msg3: Use the InventoryManager tool to streamline the product catalog for improved customer navigation.
msg4: Postprocess the catalog optimization to identify customer behavior trends and recommend UX improvements.

Task1: Design a new drone model and conduct flight testing.
msg1: Use the FlightSimulator tool to design and simulate a new drone model.
msg2: Postprocess the simulation results to perform flight testing and performance evaluation.
Task2: Optimize the aerodynamics of a new spacecraft design and validate through simulations.
msg3: Use the FlightSimulator tool to design and simulate the aerodynamics of the new spacecraft.
msg4: Postprocess the simulation data to validate the spacecraft's aerodynamic performance.

Task1: Optimize the path planning algorithm for the autonomous vehicle and conduct real-world testing.
msg1: Use the PathPlanner tool to optimize the path planning algorithm for the autonomous vehicle.
msg2: Postprocess the optimized algorithm to collect and analyze real-world test data.
Task2: Evaluate the safety of autonomous driving algorithms in complex urban environments.
msg3: Use the PathPlanner tool to refine the autonomous driving algorithms for complex urban environments.
msg4: Postprocess the refined algorithms to evaluate safety and effectiveness in real-world tests.
